rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports action factually ('all said they have offered to distribute such equipment') without high-potency framing.
Neutral language used; no moderate verb paired with scale/impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports an offer/action and lacks explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used with scale contrast.
The segment states states have offered to distribute equipment but contains no bare negation.
States state health departments 'all said they have offered to distribute such equipment'.
